    üòÄ About Me

    I am now a tenured associate professor at Shenzhen Technology University. I received my Ph.D. from Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen.

    My research areas are social media analysis, spatio-temporal data mining and large language model training and logical reasoning.

    I am always open to collaborating with remote students and researchers who are interested in social media analysis, spatio-temporal data mining and large language model training and logical reasoning, etc. Please feel free to contact me. zhangbowen@sztu.edu.cn
